title: The hidden human cost of Artificial Intelligence
content: AI’s efficiency and accuracy are built on the invisible labour of low-paid workers in developing countries. From data labelling to content moderation, ‘ghost workers’ face exploitation, insecurity, and mental health risks.

title: Hyderabad Doctor Dies Of Cardiac Arrest After Cyber Scam. She Lost 6.6 Lakhs
content: A 76-year-old female doctor in Hyderabad became a victim of organised cyber fraud, impersonation, forgery, intimidation, and extortion, which ultimately led to her death due to cardiac arrest.

title: PM Modi Birthday Live Updates | PM Modi Celebrates 75th Birthday In Madhya Pradesh
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is celebrating his 75th birthday today. He was born on September 17, 1950 in Vadnagar, a small town in North Gujarat's Mehsana district.

title: On 75th Birthday, PM Modi Launches Key Projects In Madhya Pradesh
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modiinaugurated and launched several key initiatives spanning health, nutrition, tribal welfare, and industry in Madhya Pradesh, on the occasion of his 75th birthday on Wednesday.

title: 1 Sanitation Worker Dead, 3 Injured After Falling Into Sewer In Delhi
content: A 40-year-old man died and three others were hospitalised in critical condition after they fell into a sewer in an unconscious state while cleaning it in northwest Delhi's Ashok Vihar, an official said on Wednesday.

title: Texas Student Re-Enacts Charlie Kirk's Assassination, Expelled From University
content: The Texas State University has expelled a student for re-enacting the assassination of Charlie Kirk during a memorial event on campus.

title: "Agar Tumhari Aukaat Hai...": AAP's Dare To Suryakumar Yadav After Match Win
content: Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) leader Saurabh Bharadwaj has targeted India T20I captain Suryakumar Yadav over his tribute to the victims of the Pahalgam terror attack after India's win in the Asia Cup game against Pakistan.

title: Rs 10 Lakh Invested In Zerodha Till Date, Nithin Kamath Reveals
content: Zerodha co-founder Nithin Kamath has shared insights into what makes the online stock brokerage platform stand out in the market. He said Zerodha's success happened at a time when India's stock market and retail trading were experiencing growth.

title: 'Wrote 3 Letters, Still Called BJP B-Team': A Owaisi On INDIA Bloc's Snub In Bihar
content: The AIMIM was ready to join the INDIA bloc if it was given six seats to contest in the upcoming Bihar election, party chief and Hyderabad MP Asaduddin Owaisi told NDTV

title: In Daring Heist, Gold Worth Rs 20 Crore Looted From SBI Bank In Karnataka
content: Dressed in military-style uniforms and armed with guns, a gang of three masked men stormed into a State Bank of India branch at Karnataka's Chadachan town on Tuesday evening.

title: "Trust, Belonging, Dedication": Amit Shah Shares PM Modi's Greatest Teaching
content: Home Minister Amit Shah shared a special anecdote to celebrate Prime Minister Narendra Modi's 75th birthday. He spoke about PM Modi's lifelong commitment to caring for party workers before himself.

title: Urban Company's Shares Soar In Debut After Year's Most Popular IPO
content: Urban Co. shares soared in premarket trading during its Mumbai debut after the company wrapped up India's most oversubscribed major initial public offering this year.

title: In First Foreign Outreach, Nepal Interim PM Sushila Karki To Speak With PM Modi On Thursday
content: In a significant diplomatic development, interim Prime Minister of Nepal, Sushila Karki, will hold her first conversation with a foreign leader - Prime Minister Narendra Modi - on Thursday at 11:00 am, official sources have told NDTV.

title: 'Long, Healthy Life': J&K Lt Governor, Chief Minister's Wish For PM Modi
content: Jammu and Kashmir Lt Governor Manoj Sinha, and Chief Minister Omar Abdullah and the UT's BJP leaders on Wednesday joined thousands of well-wishers to greet Prime Minister Narendra Modi on his 75th birthday.

title: "Wishing Good Health": Rahul Gandhi, M Kharge Greet PM Modi On Birthday
content: On the occasion of PM Modi's 75th birthday, leaders across the political spectrum extended their greetings and well-wishes. Congress leader Rahul Gandhi and party president Mallikarjun Kharge took to social media to convey their wishes.

title: "No Food, Toilet": 56 Indians In Georgia Treated "Like Cattle", Alleges Tourist
content: A woman has alleged that a group of 56 Indian travellers were subjected to "most inhuman behaviour" by Georgian authorities while attempting to enter the country from Armenia.

title: PM To Launch 'Swasth Nari, Sashakt Parivar Abhiyaan' As He Turns 75 Today
content: The Central government will launch 'Swasth Nari, Sashakt Parivar Abhiyaan' along with the 'Poshan Maah' on September 17. The AIIMS Delhi will be organising Medical checkup camps at four centres.

title: Khalistani Outfit Announces Siege On Indian Consulate In Vancouver
content: As India and Canada resume diplomatic ties, Sikhs for Justice (SFJ), a US-based Khalistani outfit, has threatened to "siege" the Indian Consulate in Vancouver.

title: SBI branch looted: Gang barges in, ties up staff, flees with Rs 20 crore haul
content: In a brazen heist, three masked men robbed a State Bank of India branch in Vijayapura, Karnataka, making off with over Rs 21 crore in cash and gold. Armed with country-made pistols and knives, the suspects tied up the bank staff before fleeing in a Suzuki EVA with a fake number plate.

title: PM Modi turns 75: Trump dials ‘friend’, Sunak recalls old ties; wishes pour in
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi celebrated his 75th birthday with global leaders extending their heartfelt wishes, acknowledging his leadership and India's growing global influence. US President Donald Trump, Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese, and New Zealand Prime Minister Christopher Luxon lauded PM Modi's friendship and vision. Former UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak and Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu also conveyed their greetings, emphasising strong bilateral ties.

title: 'Death-trap roads': BlackBuck CEO Rajesh Yabaji exits Bengaluru
content: BlackBuck, an online trucking platform, is relocating from its Bellandur office due to severe commuting difficulties caused by poor road infrastructure. This decision highlights the urgent need for government intervention, as other IT companies express similar concerns. Despite promises of road development and allocated funds, residents continue to face pothole-ridden roads and civic apathy, leading to protests and frustration.

title: Chess| 'Decided not to play': How Vaishali's Chennai nightmare helped her win Grand Swiss
content: Grandmaster R Vaishali secured her spot in the Women’s Candidates tournament 2026 by winning the Women’s Grand Swiss in Samarkand, a remarkable comeback after a disastrous performance in Chennai. Her brother, GM Praggnanandhaa, and her family played a crucial role in convincing her to participate, before fate intervened.

title: Hard work vs insane work: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang’s old remark; Musk responds
content: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang's rigorous work ethic, characterized by 5 a.m. to 9:30 p.m. workdays, has resurfaced, drawing admiration from the tech world. Elon Musk lauded Huang's dedication as 'Hardcore,' highlighting his own intense work habits. Both billionaires are at the forefront of AI innovation, with Huang leading Nvidia and Musk spearheading Tesla's AI chip partnership.

title: UPI upgrade! Daily transaction raised to Rs 5L for select categories - check who benefits
content: The National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) has increased UPI transaction limits for specific categories, effective September 15. Tax payments, government e-marketplaces, and B2B transactions now have a Rs 5 lakh per-transaction limit. Insurance premiums and capital markets gain a Rs 10 lakh daily limit, while peer-to-peer payments remain unchanged.

title: Amazon CEO’s warning: Company’s culture may be at risk; needs a reset
content: Andy Jassy, Amazon CEO, focuses on improving company culture. He aims to reduce bureaucracy and flatten the organizational structure. Amazon reintroduced a five-day work week. The company plans to increase worker-to-manager ratio. An email initiative helps employees flag unnecessary processes. Amazon laid off over 27,000 employees since 2022. AI integration may further reduce the corporate workforce in the coming years.

title: Rijiju takes veiled swipe after Pak admits India rejected mediation; asks will people apologise?
content: Kiren Rijiju inquired if critics of India's policy on third-party mediation would apologize. This follows Pakistan's acknowledgement that India rejected external involvement during Operation Sindoor. Mohammad Ishaq Dar confirmed India's stance, contradicting claims of US-brokered peace. India maintains that discussions with Pakistan should remain bilateral.

title: ‘Quiet!’: Trump snaps at Australian reporter over wealth question - watch
content: Donald Trump clashed with an Australian journalist over his business dealings as president, accusing him of "hurting Australia" and threatening to complain to Anthony Albanese. The confrontation confirmed a planned meeting between Trump and Albanese at the UN General Assembly.

title: Can’t cook dal on my own, but I can be the 'namak': Chirag Paswan on Bihar CM bid
content: Chirag Paswan, LJP (Ram Vilas) chief, has dismissed any ambition for Bihar's CM post in 2025, setting his sights on 2030 and 2035. He affirmed his party's commitment to strengthening the NDA alliance and highlighted their potential to significantly boost NDA candidates' vote share in the upcoming assembly polls. Paswan also ruled out any alliance with Prashant Kishor's party.

title: Musk’s extreme work routine: Powering Tesla and SpaceX; redefining ambition
content: Elon Musk maintains a rigorous work schedule. This routine fuels Tesla's success and Neuralink's advancements. Optimus, the humanoid robot project, is set for rollout. Experts warn of potential dangers from chronic overwork. Musk's lifestyle highlights the effort behind technological breakthroughs. It also raises concerns about the sustainability of such intense ambition. His schedule is a story of achievement and caution.

title: Infant among 3 family members killed in Mandi landslide, HP monsoon toll 417
content: A devastating landslide in Himachal Pradesh's Mandi district claimed three lives, including an infant, after heavy rains caused a house collapse in Baragata village. While two family members were rescued alive, others perished. This tragedy follows another recent landslide in Sundernagar that killed seven. The State Disaster Management Authority reports the monsoon death toll has reached 417.

title: Woman stabbed twice, chants shlokas, plays dead; ex-driver & gang loots home
content: In Bengaluru, a former driver orchestrated a robbery at his ex-employer's house, targeting valuables with two accomplices. The elderly woman was brutally stabbed when she couldn't provide the keys, but she played dead to deter the assailants. After the robbers ransacked the house and left, the woman bravely alerted neighbors, leading to the capture of one suspect.

title: 'You are all I worry about love': Did Robinson confess to killing Kirk? Read his full texts to partner
content: Tyler Robinson faces charges for the murder of Charlie Kirk. The incident occurred at Utah Valley University. Robinson allegedly confessed in a note. He told his partner about his plan. The weapon was found near the campus. Robinson's DNA was on the rifle. Kirk was a conservative figure. Robinson's family influenced his surrender. He now faces the death penalty.

title: When Archana Puran Singh revealed how ego clashes affected her marriage
content: Archana Puran Singh recently shared insights into her marriage with Parmeet Sethi, revealing past challenges and ego clashes. She credits a spiritual camp in Bangalore and the Sudarshan Kriya technique for revitalizing their bond. Archana emphasized that overcoming challenges defines a 'perfect couple'.

title: Watch: Trump, Epstein images flash on Windsor castle walls as US President visits
content: Donald Trump's UK visit is met with controversy as protestors project images linking him to Jeffrey Epstein onto Windsor Castle, leading to arrests. Demonstrations are planned in London as Trump prepares for talks with King Charles III and Prime Minister Keir Starmer. The visit occurs amidst scrutiny of Trump's past ties to Epstein and recent dismissal of the UK ambassador to Washington over similar links.

title: ITR filing due date missed? What happens next - penalties, late fees explained
content: The CBDT had extended the ITR filing deadline for individual taxpayers to September 16, 2025. Filing after this date incurs penalties, potentially up to Rs 5,000, and affects carry-forward benefits. Taxpayers opting for the old regime must file by the deadline to claim deductions like HRA and LTA, otherwise new regime is the default option.

title: 'My entire income is gone': Destiny claims Musk, conservatives behind Twitch ban
content: Political streamer Destiny, Steven Bonnell II, faces a Twitch ban he attributes to a coordinated effort by Elon Musk and conservatives, alleging it's free speech issues following controversial comments on Charlie Kirk. Destiny claims his income is eliminated due to the ban, triggered by 'Hateful Conduct' accusations related to discrimination.

title: 3 hour security check forces shooters to miss flight for tournament
content: Young rifle and pistol shooters from Pune missed their Akasa Air flight to Goa due to extensive security checks on their firearms and ammunition at Pune airport. This delay jeopardized their participation in the 12th West Zone Shooting Championship. Akasa Air acknowledged the issue and is arranging alternate travel for the affected athletes, expressing regret for the inconvenience caused.

title: 'Life imprisonment' for stray dogs who bite humans twice in Uttar Pradesh
content: Following a surge in dog bite incidents, Uttar Pradesh has implemented new rules for managing aggressive stray dogs. The policy mandates observation, sterilization, and microchipping for unprovoked biters, with repeat offenders facing shelter confinement unless adopted. A committee will determine provocation, and behavioral training will be provided to address stress-related aggression, balancing public safety and animal welfare.

title: ITR filing: Has due date been extended beyond Sept 16? What taxpayers should know
content: ITR filing FY 2024-25 due date: The Income Tax Department does not seem to have extended the ITR filing deadline for Assessment Year 2025-26, meaning returns filed after September 16 will be considered belated. While the initial deadline was extended to September 16 due to portal issues, no further extensions have been granted despite ongoing user complaints.

title: LPG runs dry, WiFi cut: Delhi Police constable's son thrashes mother to death in rage
content: In Jaipur's Kardhani, Naveen Singh, 31, has been arrested for allegedly murdering his mother, Santosh, 52. A disturbing video captured Singh's brutal assault in the kitchen, even as his father, a Delhi Police constable, and sisters tried to intervene. The incident occurred after an argument over the internet connection and an empty LPG cylinder escalated, leading to the fatal attack.

title: Urban Company IPO listing: Shares debut at nearly 60% premium on D-Street
content: Urban Company's IPO made a stellar debut on Dalal Street, listing at a significant premium and surging further, reflecting strong investor confidence. The Rs 1,900-crore IPO witnessed overwhelming subscription, exceeding 103 times, driven by QIBs, non-institutional, and retail investors. This successful listing underscores Urban Company's market leadership and growth potential in the home services sector.

title: How much revenue will Pakistan lose if they pull out of the Asia Cup?
content: Pakistan's threat to withdraw from the Asia Cup over a referee dispute could cost them millions in revenue, potentially jeopardising their financial stability within the Asian Cricket Council. This potential decision, driven by PCB chief Naqvi's criticism of the match referee, risks a significant loss from broadcast deals and sponsorships.

title: Rs 50 crore for Congress MLAs, Rs 25 crore for BJP’s: Uneven road funds for Bengaluru sparks outcry
content: The Siddaramaiah government in Bengaluru has sparked controversy by disbursing road repair funds unevenly, allocating ₹50 crore to constituencies with Congress MLAs and ₹25 crore to those with BJP MLAs. This decision has drawn sharp criticism from opposition parties, who allege it is discriminatory and will hinder development in their constituencies.

title: ‘No intent, no negligence’: Accused Gaganpreet files bail plea in Delhi BMW accident case
content: Gaganpreet Makkad, accused in the fatal BMW accident, filed a bail application claiming no intent or negligence. The victim, Navjot Singh's body was taken to his injured wife in the hospital, resulting in a heartbreaking scene. Investigations reveal Makkad transported the couple to a hospital owned by her relatives, raising questions about the choice of facility.

title: Clash with Booker, shouting contest with Schiff: Watch Kash Patel’s Senate hearing
content: FBI Director Kash Patel's Senate oversight hearing devolved into a partisan spectacle, marked by heated exchanges and personal insults. Democrats accused Patel of undermining the FBI's integrity and carrying out a political agenda, while Republicans praised him as a reformer. The contentious session also addressed recent FBI firings and Patel's handling of the Charlie Kirk case.

title: Puja Khedkar’s family 'vanishes' after 'abduction' of trucker
content: Maharashtra police are searching for the family of Puja Khedkar after her father, Dilip Khedkar, and his driver allegedly abducted a truck helper following a road rage incident near Navi Mumbai. The victim was rescued from their Pune bungalow. Police accuse Manorama Khedkar, Puja's mother, of obstructing the investigation by helping the men escape and unleashing dogs on the police.

title: White nights: Shubhanshu Shukla’s surreal ISS view; science meets wonder
content: Astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla, India's first on the ISS, experienced 'white nights' during the Axiom-4 mission, where the sun never fully set. This phenomenon, caused by the station's beta angle, challenged the crew's sense of time and routine. Besides the awe, persistent sunlight posed operational hurdles, affecting cooling and solar array stress.

title: Asia Cup| 'Don't blame Indian cricketers, they were given orders': Afridi on handshake row
content: Shahid Afridi has criticised the Indian cricket team for allegedly refusing post-match handshakes after their Asia Cup victory against Pakistan, citing a lack of sportsman spirit. Afridi suggests the players were instructed by the BCCI due to social media pressure and national sentiments.

title: Aishwarya, Abhishek didn't comment on divorce speculations: Prahlad Kakkar
content: Even as there were divorce rumours, Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan maintained a dignified silence. The silently proved that they are together and remained unaffected by all the speculations. Now adman Prahlad Kakkar has opened up on their equation and steered clear on the rumours.

title: Black student found hanging at US university: Classes cancelled amid lynching fears
content: The death of Demartravion “Trey” Reed, a Black student found hanging from a tree at Delta State University, has sparked outrage and demands for an independent investigation. Despite police claims of no foul play, Reed's family, supported by civil rights attorney Ben Crump, seeks transparency and answers, citing communication failures and Mississippi's history of racial violence.

title: Youth hacked to death in Tamil Nadu by lover’s relatives
content: In Mayiladuthurai, a 28-year-old Dalit man was brutally murdered by relatives of his girlfriend, who disapproved of their decade-long relationship. The victim, K Vairamuthu, was attacked while returning home, leading to protests and demands for justice, including invoking the SC/ST Act against the girl's mother, who allegedly instigated the crime.

title: Will Pak play in the Asia Cup today or withdraw? PCB makes position clear
content: The Pakistan Cricket Board is contemplating withdrawing from the Asia Cup due to a dispute over match referee Andy Pycroft following the India-Pakistan match. Pakistan demands Pycroft's removal, accusing him of mishandling the no-handshake incident and Suryakumar Yadav's dedication of the win to the victims of the Pahalgam terror attack.

title: After 3 days of ‘digital arrest’, Hyderabad retired doctor dies of heart attack
content: A 76-year-old retired doctor in Hyderabad tragically died of a heart attack after enduring three days of relentless harassment by cyber fraudsters posing as law enforcement. The scammers extorted Rs 6.6 lakh from her under the guise of a 'digital arrest' and continued their threats even after her death. Police have registered a case and are investigating the cybercrime.

title: Mumbai Monorail blow: Third shutdown in 8 years; services suspended from Sept 20
content: Mumbai's Monorail will suspend operations from September 20 for a system overhaul, announced MMRDA, following frequent breakdowns. This shutdown, the third in eight years, aims to integrate new 'Make in India' rakes, commission advanced signalling, and refurbish the ageing fleet. Deputy CM Eknath Shinde emphasized that this vital step will strengthen Mumbai's transport.

title: ‘Scripted!’: Are Tyler Robinson’s texts with his trans partner fake?
content: Text messages released in the Charlie Kirk assassination case have sparked controversy, with figures like Candace Owens alleging they are doctored. Online skepticism focuses on the messages' language and tone, questioning their authenticity. Prosecutors maintain the texts, along with DNA evidence and a confession note, link Tyler Robinson to the crime, while Robinson remains silent amidst the allegations.

title: FaZe Clan fallout: From co-founder Temperrr’s removal to misconduct claims
content: FaZe Clan has severed ties with co-founder Thomas “Temperrr” Oliveira following serious allegations of inappropriate conduct. This decision ends a decade-long partnership that significantly shaped the esports organization. Former member FaZe Rain detailed the allegations, prompting widespread community discussion about ethical standards and accountability within esports leadership. Temperrr has expressed shock over his sudden removal.

title: Top players discuss playoff format, cheat meals, hype-up music
content: the NHL is close to being back in action for the 2025-26 season . a new collective bargaining agreement has been signed between the league and the players . "cheat meals," pregame pump-up tunes and weird equipment quirks are among the favorites .

title: Tatiana Suarez back on track in wide-open strawweight top 10
content: Tatiana Suarez beats Amanda lemos at Noche UFC on saturday . the 115-pound wrestler is in need of a first challenger . suarez will challenge Valentina Shevchenko for a belt on Nov. 15 .

title: NFL Week 3 betting: Odds, lines and totals for every game
content: the Miami Dolphins host the Buffalo Bills on "Thursday Night Football" on tuesday . a matchup of undefeated teams will feature the New York Giants and the Kansas City Chiefs . the team is the biggest favorite on the week 3 slate .

title: Wrestlepalooza 2025: Date, time, channel, card, how to watch
content: the deal includes two-night events, such as WrestleMania and SummerSlam, plus other WWE premium live events . the event will mark the first premium live event (PLE) from WWE on ESPN . pre-show coverage starts at 5 p.m. ET .

title: WNBA playoff schedule: Seattle, Indiana pull even, force series to Game 3
content: the WNBA playoffs are underway, but no team is going quietly . both the Seattle Storm and the Indiana Fever won to force their series to a decisive Game 3 . the longest winning streak in the series came to an end after a 14-point deficit .

title: Indiana-Illinois and under-the-radar games in the College Football Playoff hunt
content: two teams are set to meet in front of a sold-out crowd . one team made the college football Playoff in 2024 . the other won 10 games last season, finished no. 16 in AP poll . both coaches have won championships and individual awards .

title: Buzz: Don't be fooled by Chubb's box score; how backups affect Jets, Vikings, Commanders
content: the fantasy football buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around the NFL . Nick Chubb finished with 14 touches and 15.2 fantasy points against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers . he averaged just 3.7 yards per carry, and that includes his 25-yard touchdown run late in the game .

title: 61 cyber criminals across 14 States arrested by Hyderabad police
content: 61 people across 14 states were arrested during a month-long cyber crime operation by the cyber crime wing of the Hyderabad policing wing . a total of 61 individuals across 14 States were arrested in a police operation .
